metadata.title: CVE-2021-27803 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A vulnerability was discovered in how p2p/p2p_pd.c in wpa_supplicant before2.10 processes P2P (Wi-Fi Direct) provision discovery requests. It couldresult in denial of service or other impact (potentially execution ofarbitrary code), for an attacker within radio range.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-27803` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

hostapd - 1:2.4-0ubuntu6.8
wpagui - 2.4-0ubuntu6.8
wpasupplicant - 2.4-0ubuntu6.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wpa package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4-0ubuntu6.8').
wpa package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4-0ubuntu6.8').
